column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The first time we came for breakfast
column2: I was really impressed.  Service was great and fast
column3: and the quality of food was impressive.  I had a Colorado omelet with hash browns
column4: and it was done perfectly.  My son had oreo pancakes AND belgian waffles with apples
column5: and he loved them.  My daughter had a Florence benedict and liked it
column6: and my wife had the berry bliss pancakes and thought they were okay.
